text: is a Japanese politician and member of the Liberal Democratic Party. Kaneko is the Minister of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries since October 2021 during the Fumio Kishida cabinet.Who's who in Cabinet of Japan's new PM Fumio Kishida He has been a member of the House of Councillors since 2010. He was the Governor of Nagasaki Prefecture from 1998 until 2010. He was also a member of the House of Representatives from 1983 until 1998. Kaneko was born in Ikitsuki, Nagasaki, Japan. He studied at Keio University. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:People from Nagasaki Prefecture Category:Ministers of agriculture, forestry and fisheries of Japan
